entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
